result.reason: Feature request to integrate VMWare Horizon Client functionality, enhancing mRemoteNG's connection capabilities.
result.approach: Implement a new VMWare Horizon protocol handler by creating a dedicated directory and developing classes to interface with the VMWare Horizon Client, leveraging existing protocol integration patterns within mRemoteNG.
